short_term_memory.content: I was met with harsh, unkind words from someone who showed little respect. It's disheartening when people speak that way, as I believe true worth and respect are earned through honest actions, not through such careless talk.

Someone approached me with unsettling words, claiming this was which I found quite odd and confusing. Their strange repetition offered no clear purpose or actions to understand their intent, leaving me cautious about what they might mean.
